description:
Shiggy is one of http://anidb.net/ch88493 [Riko]`s friends at the Orphanage. He helped Riko hide http://anidb.net/ch88494 [Reg]`s true nature from the adults and just like http://anidb.net/ch89865 [Nat], he knew of Riko`s plans to search for http://anidb.net/ch89868 [her mother] in the Abyss.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shiggy
